dict.acceptation: 病毒；病毒性疾病；毒素，毒害；[计算机科学]计算机病毒；

sent.orig: Chicken Anemia Virus(CAV) is the pathogen of ChickenInfectious Anemia(CIA). CAV belongs to Circoviridae.
sent.trans: 鸡贫血病毒(chicken anemia virus,CAV)是鸡传染性贫血病(chicken infectious anemia,VIA)的病原，属圆环病毒科(Circoviridae)。

sent.orig: In the early days, pathologists called any agent of infectious disease 'virus'.
sent.trans: 在早期，植物病理学家把任何侵染性病害的因子，都叫做‘virus’。

sent.orig: Infectious flacherie virus(IFV)is the agent causing flacherie disease of silkworm.
sent.trans: 病毒性软化病是一种严重影响蚕业生产的流行病，其病原为家蚕传染性软化病病毒(Bombyx moriinfectious flacherie virus,BmIFV)。

sent.orig: Chicken anemia virus (CAV) is the pathogen of chicken infectious anemia (CIA). CAV belongs to circoviridae.
sent.trans: 鸡贫血病毒(chicken anemia virus,CAV)是鸡传染性贫血病(chickeninfectious anemia,VIA)的病原，属于圆环病毒科(Circoviridae)。

sent.orig: Objective To construct Giardia canis virus(GCV) transfection vector.
sent.trans: 目的构建犬贾第虫病毒(Giardia canis virus,GCV)转染载体。
